404.subtext_html: The page you requested does not exist. Click here to continue shopping.

password_page.signup_form_success: We will send you an email right before we open!
password_page.admin_link_html: Are you the store owner? Log in here

newsletter_form.signup: What resonated with Walter the most was that their shops not only provided general provisions and impeccable service.
newsletter_form.confirmation: Thank you! You have been subscribed.

search.no_results_html: Your search for "{{ terms }}" did not yield any results.
search.results_for_html: Your search for "{{ terms }}" revealed the following:
search.title: Search for products on our site

exit_intent.text: We only send emails once a month, and only about good things.

comments.title: Leave a comment
comments.name: Name
comments.moderated: Please note, comments must be approved before they are published
comments.success_moderated: Your comment was posted successfully. We will publish it in a little while, as our blog is moderated.
comments.success: Your comment was posted successfully! Thank you!

general.title: SHOPPING BASKET
general.note: Gift messages (please note what you write here will be printed directly onto the delivery note. We avoid using extra cards in order to save a few trees). Pricing and billing addresses are not printed on delivery notes.
general.subtotal: UK shipping: £5 (3-5 working days) or free when you spend £75 // Please note you may be asked to verify your age at the checkout.
general.shipping_at_checkout: Please note we do not currently ship outside of the UK
general.empty_html: Your basket is currently empty. Head back to the shop to buy our spirits. Like this!

general.no_matches: Sorry, there are no products in this collection

onboarding.modal_title: This page will show all of your store's products
onboarding.no_products_html: There are no products yet, but once you begin adding them they will show up here regardless if they are in a collection.

form.name: FULL NAME
form.post_success: Thanks for enquiring about our cask offer. We will be in touch shortly.

activate_account.title: Activate Account
activate_account.subtext: Create your password to activate your account.

orders.title: ORDER HISTORY
orders.none: You haven't placed any orders yet.

recover_password.title: Reset your password
recover_password.subtext: We will send you an email to reset your password.
recover_password.success: We've sent you an email with a link to update your password.

reset_password.title: Reset account password
reset_password.subtext: Enter a new password for {{ email }}

onboarding.no_products_html: You have no products in your Frontpage collection. This placeholder will appear until you add a product to this collection.
onboarding.no_collections_html: You don't have any collections to show here. Add some collections to go along with the default Frontpage.
onboarding.navbar_bold: It looks like you haven't configured your navigation
onboarding.navbar: You'll want to do that now by specifying a link list in the customization menu.
onboarding.featured_blog: In order for this section to work, you must have at least three blogs posts and have selected a blog to feature in the Customization Settings.
onboarding.collection_setup: In order for this section to work, you must have selected a collection to feature in the Customization Settings.
onboarding.newsletter: Looks like you haven’t set this section up yet. You’ll need to head to your Customization Settings in order to do that.
onboarding.blog_excerpt: Your store hasn’t published any blog posts yet. A blog can be used to talk about new product launches, tips, or other news you want to share with your customers. You can check out Shopify’s ecommerce blog for inspiration and advice for your own store and blog.
onboarding.featured_product_description: Head to your theme settings to select a product for this home page section.

footer.newsletter_body: We only send emails once a month, and only about good things.
footer.about_text: What resonated with Walter the most was that their shops not only provided general provisions and impeccable service.
footer.no_social: You can add individual social icons through the general settings menu.
